org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value:
set -eu echo "whoami=$(id -un) uid=$(id -u)"
# ---- Docker CLI ---- if ! command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[INFO] Installing Docker CLI (Debian repo)…" apt-get update -y apt-get install -y docker.io ca-certificates curl gnupg || true fi if ! command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[INFO] Installing Docker CLI (Docker official repo)…" install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/debian/gpg | gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/debian bookworm stable" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list apt-get update -y apt-get install -y docker-ce-cli || true fi command -v docker >/dev/null || { echo "[ERROR] Docker CLI still missing"; exit 1; } docker --version || true
# ---- Compose v2/v1 ---- COMPOSE_BIN="" if docker compose version >/dev/null 2>&1; then COMPOSE_BIN="docker compose" else echo "[INFO] Trying compose v2 plugin…" apt-get update -y apt-get install -y docker-compose-plugin || true if docker compose version >/dev/null 2>&1; then COMPOSE_BIN="docker compose" else echo "[INFO] Falling back to compose v1…" apt-get install -y docker-compose || true if command -v docker-compose >/dev/null 2>&1; then COMPOSE_BIN="docker-compose" fi fi fi [ -n "$COMPOSE_BIN" ] || { echo "[ERROR] No compose (v2/v1) available"; exit 1; } echo "COMPOSE_BIN=$COMPOSE_BIN" > .compose_bin
# ---- Docker socket ---- [ -S /var/run/docker.sock ] || { echo "[ERROR] /var/run/docker.sock not mounted"; exit 2; }
# Diagnóstico (no falla si no encuentra el compose) . .compose_bin $COMPOSE_BIN -f "${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH}" ps || true

set -eu if [ -f .compose_bin ]; then . .compose_bin; else COMPOSE_BIN="docker compose"; fi
CMD="spark-submit --master ${SPARK_MASTER_URL} --conf spark.hadoop.fs.defaultFS=${HDFS_URI} ${TRAIN_SCRIPT}"
if [ -f "${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH}" ]; then echo "[RUN] $COMPOSE_BIN -f ${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH} exec -T pyspark-client bash -lc "$CMD"" $COMPOSE_BIN -f "${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH}" exec -T pyspark-client bash -lc "$CMD" else echo "[WARN] ${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH} not found; trying docker exec → pyspark-client" CID="$(docker ps -qf 'name=pyspark-client')" [ -n "$CID" ] || { echo "[ERROR] container 'pyspark-client' not running"; exit 3; } docker exec -i "$CID" bash -lc "$CMD" fi
